ModMetaData.name: [JPT] Fertile Fields Makeover
ModMetaData.author: jptrrs
ModMetaData.description: Everybody loves Rainbeau's Fertile Fields... but only for what's inside! I thought it deserved better looks, so that's what I did. This is a recoloring and retexture of its resources. I didn't touch the buildings or the UI, tough, as it seems to me they fit well within the rest of the game.
